Package besucha.backend.service

Class StudentService

  • java.lang.Object
    • besucha.backend.service.accessdao.StudentService
  • @Service
public class StudentService
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstracts access to StudentDao objects in database.

      • getStudentDao

        public StudentDao getStudentDao​(int studentId)
        // todo: test @command line Get a StudentDao object
        Parameters:

      • saveStudentDao

        public void saveStudentDao​(int studentId,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String seniority)
                    throws SeniorityInvalidException
        Create and save a StudentDao object to the repo.
        Parameters:
        studentId - id of student to be created as int
        name - name of student as String
        seniority - student seniority as String, which will be converted into Seniority enum. Seniority must be exactly: "Senior", "Junior", "Sophomore", "Freshman"
        Throws:
        SeniorityInvalidException - throws exception of Seniority is not one of aforementioned values.

      • saveStudentDao

        public void saveStudentDao​(int studentId,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           Seniority seniority)
        Create and save a StudentDao object to the repo.
        Parameters:
        studentId - id of student to be created as int
        name - name of student as String
        seniority - student seniority as Seniority object

      • saveStudentDao

        public void saveStudentDao​(StudentDao studentDao)
        Save StudentDao object.
        Parameters:
        studentDao - object to save.

      • count

        public long count()

      • getAllStudents

        public java.util.List<Student> getAllStudents()
        Query db for all StudentDao objects (and PreferenceDao objects), convert to Student objects and return as List of Student objects.
        Returns:
        a List of Student objects that are located in the db.
